f635dfd2-51ed-4535-a47a-48aadf59ae8a.name: 仆从
f635dfd2-51ed-4535-a47a-48aadf59ae8a.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

860ca44f-c339-47b1-aed6-9c469c09c81d.name: 感同身受
860ca44f-c339-47b1-aed6-9c469c09c81d.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

4f337822-5dd4-48a6-ba3b-962ab023e6d4.name: 感同身受
4f337822-5dd4-48a6-ba3b-962ab023e6d4.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

ac0aeb73-673b-44ce-becc-a9c7210e0742.name: 感同身受
ac0aeb73-673b-44ce-becc-a9c7210e0742.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

1a468212-12cf-459d-81ec-18fadca0fa0b.name: 感同身受
1a468212-12cf-459d-81ec-18fadca0fa0b.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

6a50d566-bbaa-43ba-a114-9cd2df31772c.name: 期待陪伴
6a50d566-bbaa-43ba-a114-9cd2df31772c.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

bd367973-c0ed-4c1f-a715-44e3e6f2f6bd.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
bd367973-c0ed-4c1f-a715-44e3e6f2f6bd.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less
